abstract: The private equity giant Kohlberg Kravis Roberts announced its intention to sell $350 million in 10-year senior unsecured bonds.
snippet: The private equity giant Kohlberg Kravis Roberts announced its intention to sell $350 million in 10-year senior unsecured bonds.
lead_paragraph: 4:11 p.m. | Updated The merchants of debt at Kohlberg Kravis Roberts & Company, the New York private equity giant, are finally peddling some of their own.
